Package pec

package pec
The PEC (Pending Event Container) package contains classes for managing and scheduling events in a discrete event simulation. It provides a PEC class that implements a queue for storing and retrieving events based on their scheduled time. The Event class represents a simulation event and can be extended to define specific event types.
  • Class
    Description
    Event
    The Event class represents an event in the simulation.
    IEvent
    The IEvent interface defines the contract for an event in the simulation.
    PEC
    The PEC (Pending Event Container) class represents the event control system in the simulation.
